title: Lost Acsess To My Own Club!
body:
Ever since the club problems i got kicked out of my club and being the owner of it my friend cant disband it and remake it.

Clubs I'm Currently In:
[http://imgur.com/1Lgpg4Y](http://imgur.com/1Lgpg4Y)

Prof I am In said club:
[http://imgur.com/tCbM8c2](http://imgur.com/tCbM8c2)

replies.body: Are you still having this problem?  There's been some problems with clubs, but the clubs team is working on [solutions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nMisJPK8-clubs-outage-oct-2016).  Hang on if you're still having issues!
Yes, I am still having the problem, and thank you for the replay I shall hang on!

Happened to me. Somehow, by going in the LoL Friends app (an app that makes you able to communicate with the people of your friends list on your phone) and setting the club as active, it solved the problem. (Had to reconnect tho)
It's not an amazing solution, but yeah, it worked for me so maybe it could work for you
